typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		alias as string,
		resourcestatus as string,
		resourcetype as integer,
		countrycode as string,
		PersonnelNumber as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> oneprofileResources
source(output(
		id as integer,
		personnelnumber as string,
		fromdate as timestamp,
		todate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> vac01staging
CountryAndStatusFilter select(mapColumn(
		alias,
		PersonnelNumber
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveUnnecessaryColumns
oneprofileResources filter(resourcestatus!= '3' && resourcestatus!='Y') ~> CountryAndStatusFilter
vac01staging select(mapColumn(
		personnelnumber,
		fromdate,
		todate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveUnnecessaryColumnVacation
RemoveUnnecessaryColumns, RemoveUnnecessaryColumnVacation join(RemoveUnnecessaryColumns@PersonnelNumber == RemoveUnnecessaryColumnVacation@personnelnumber,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerJoin
InnerJoin sink(input(
		id as integer,
		personnelnumber as string,
		fromdate as timestamp,
		todate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> saveResult
